description: Chant the glory of the Sun.
name: chants

talents.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, granting you 42, 57, 68, 78, 86 Physical Save and Spell Save and increasing your maximum life by 5.4%, 10%, 14%, 18%, 22% (Currently: 54, 100, 142, 180, 215).

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of light, dealing 15, 20, 24, 27, 30 light damage to anything that hits you in melee.

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The saves and light damage will increase with your Spellpower and the life with talent level.
talents.name: Chant of Fortitude

talents.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, reducing the damage enemies 3 or more spaces away deal by 14%, 20%, 25%, 28%, 31%.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of light, dealing 15, 20, 24, 27, 30 light damage to anything that hits you in melee.

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The damage reduction will increase with talent level and light damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Chant of Fortress

talents.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, granting you 14%, 19%, 23%, 26%, 29% resistance to all damage.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of light, dealing 15, 20, 24, 27, 30 light damage to anything that hits you in melee.

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Chant of Resistance

talents.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, empowering your light and fire elemental attacks so that they do 29%, 40%, 48%, 55%, 61% additional damage.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of light, dealing 15, 20, 24, 27, 30 light damage to anything that hits you in melee.

Your lite radius is also increased by 2, 3, 4, 5, 6.

You may only have one Chant active at once and this Chant costs less power to sustain.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Chant of Light

description: Bind the power of the Moon into circles at your feet.
name: circles

talents.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 at your feet; the circle increases your Defense by 17, 23, 28, 32, 35, and deals 18, 24, 28, 32, 36 darkness damage per turn to everyone else with in its radius. The circle lasts 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Circle of Shifting Shadows

talents.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 at your feet; the circle lights up affected tiles, increases your positive energy by 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 each turn, and deals 8.51, 11, 14, 16, 17 light damage and 8.51, 11, 14, 16, 17 fire damage per turn to everyone else within its radius. The circle lasts 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Circle of Blazing Light

talents.info_text: Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 at your feet; the circle protects you from silence effects while you remain in its radius, and silences everyone else who enters. The circle lasts 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.
talents.name: Circle of Sanctity

talents.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 at your feet; the circle slows incoming projectiles by 57%, 77%, 93%, 106%, 117%, and attempts to push all creatures other then yourself out of its radius, inflicting 11, 15, 19, 21, 24 light damage and 11, 15, 19, 21, 24 darkness damage per turn as it does so. The circle lasts 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Circle of Warding

description: Your devotion allows you to combat your foes with indomitable determination.
name: combat

talents.info_text:
Infuse your weapon with the power of the Sun, adding 18, 38, 53, 65, 76 light damage on each melee hit.

Additionally, if you have a temporary damage shield active, melee attacks will increase its power by 9, 18, 26, 32, 38.

If the same shield is refreshed 20 times it will become unstable and explode, removing it.

The damage dealt and shield bonus will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Weapon of Light

talents.info_text:
In a pure display of power, you project a ranged melee attack, doing 141%, 162%, 179%, 193%, 205% weapon damage.

If the target is outside of melee range, you have a chance to project a second attack against it for 58%, 82%, 103%, 121%, 137% weapon damage.

The second strike chance (which increases with distance) is 8.4%, 16%, 23%, 29%, 34% at range 2 and 34%, 51%, 61%, 67%, 72% at the maximum range of 2, 4, 6, 8, 10.

The range will increase with your Strength.
talents.name: Wave of Power

talents.info_text:
Your weapon attacks burn with righteous fury, dealing 17%, 56%, 70%, 77%, 81% of your lost HP as additional Fire damage (up to 258, 349, 419, 478, 531, Current: 0).

Targets struck are also afflicted with a Martyrdom effect that causes them to take 5%, 13%, 19%, 23%, 26% of all damage they deal for 4 turns.
talents.name: Weapon of Wrath

talents.info_text: Any attack that would drop you below 1 hit point instead triggers Second Life, deactivating the talent, setting your hit points to 1, then healing you for 99, 199, 286, 362, 429.
talents.name: Second Life

description: Forgo your shield for the chance to crush your foes with a mighty two handed weapon.
name: crusader

talents.info_text:
You strike your foe with your two handed weapon, dealing 166%, 189%, 207%, 222%, 235% weapon damage.

If the attack hits, all foes in radius 2 will have their light resistance reduced by 5%, 10%, 14%, 18%, 21% and their damage reduced by 1%, 5%, 9%, 13%, 16% for 5 turns.
talents.name: Absorption Strike

talents.info_text: You mark a target with light for 5 turns, causing all melee hits you deal to it to heal you for 16%, 29%, 39%, 46%, 52% of the damage done.
talents.name: Mark of Light

talents.info_text:
While wielding a two handed weapon, your critical strike chance is increased by 3%, 5%, 7%, 9%, 10%, and your melee criticals instill you with righteous strength, increasing all physical and light damage you deal by 5%, 8%, 11%, 13%, 15%, stacking up to 3 times.

In addition, your melee critical strikes leave a lasting lightburn on the target, dealing 74, 100, 120, 137, 152 light damage over 5 turns and reducing opponents armour by 5, 14, 21, 27, 32.

The damage increases with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Righteous Strength

talents.info_text:
Infuse your two handed weapon with light while spinning around.

All creatures in radius one take 87%, 103%, 114%, 125%, 133% weapon damage.

In addition while spinning your weapon shines so much it deals 86%, 109%, 127%, 142%, 155% light weapon damage to all foes in radius 2.

At level 4 your spinning blade creates a shield that blocks all damage for 1 turn.
talents.name: Flash of the Blade

description: The moment of the Eclipse is the moment of Truth, when Sun and Moon are in tandem and the energies of the world hang in the balance. Intense focus allows the greatest Anorithils to harness these energies to unleash devastating forces...
name: eclipse

talents.info_text: Increases your spell critical chance by 3%, 7%, 10%, 13%, 16%.
talents.name: Blood Red Moon

talents.info_text:
Increases your light and darkness resistance penetration by 23%, 36%, 45%, 51%, 57% for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns, and reduces the cooldown of all Celestial skills by 2, 3, 4, 5, 6.

The resistance penetration will increase with your Cunning.
talents.name: Totality

talents.info_text:
Each time one of your spells criticals, you project a bolt of light or shadow at up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 targets within radius 6, doing 42, 57, 68, 78, 87 light damage or 42, 57, 68, 78, 87 darkness damage per bolt.

This effect costs 2 positive or 2 negative energy each time it's triggered, and will not activate if either your positive or negative energy is below 2.

The damage scales with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Corona

talents.info_text:
This powerful spell grants you 20, 27, 32, 36, 39 bonus invisibility, but converts 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 negative energy into positive energy each turn. Once your positive energy exceeds your negative energy, or you deactivate the talent, the effect ends in an explosion of light, converting all of your positive energy into damage and inflicting an additional 61, 83, 99, 113, 126 damage to everything in a radius of 2, 3, 3, 4, 4.

As you become invisible, you fade out of phase with reality; all your damage is reduced by 50%.

You may not cast Twilight while this spell is active, and you should take off your light source; otherwise, others will spot you with ease.

The invisibility bonus will increase with your Cunning, and the explosion damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Darkest Light

description: Bind the brilliant powers into glyphs to trap your foes.
name: glyphs

talents.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All enemies walking over the glyph will be dazed for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The glyph is a hidden trap (28, 39, 48, 56, 62 detection and 35, 49, 60, 70, 78 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.
talents.name: Glyph of Paralysis

talents.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All targets walking over the glyph will be hit by a blast that knocks them back and does 35, 49, 61, 70, 79 physical damage.

The glyph is a hidden trap (28, 39, 48, 56, 62 detection and 35, 49, 60, 70, 78 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Glyph of Repulsion

talents.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All targets walking over the glyph will trigger an explosion of light that does 35, 49, 61, 70, 79 damage to everyone within 1 tile.

The glyph is a hidden trap (28, 39, 48, 56, 62 detection and 28, 39, 48, 56, 62 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Glyph of Explosion

talents.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All targets walking over the glyph will be slowed by 27%, 35%, 43%, 50%, 58% for 5 turns.

The glyph is a hidden trap (35, 49, 60, 70, 78 detection and 35, 49, 60, 70, 78 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.
talents.name: Glyph of Fatigue

description: Your devotion grants you additional protection.
name: guardian

talents.info_text:
Infuse your shield with light, healing you for 13, 17, 21, 23, 26 each time you take damage at the expense of up to 2 positive energy.

If you do not have any positive energy, the effect will not trigger.

Additionally, once per turn successful melee attacks will trigger a bonus attack with your shield dealing 42%, 56%, 66%, 75%, 83% light damage.

The healing done will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shield of Light

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon doing 193%, 232%, 262%, 287%, 309% damage, and with a shield strike doing 146%, 166%, 181%, 193%, 204% damage. If the shield strike connects, your shield will explode in a burst of light that inflicts 126, 170, 204, 233, 259 light damage on all targets except yourself within radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 of the target, and light up all tiles in that radius.

The light damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Brandish

talents.info_text:
Retribution negates half of all damage you take while it is active. Once Retribution has negated 259, 349, 419, 479, 532 damage, your shield will explode in a burst of light, inflicting damage equal to the amount negated in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 and deactivating the talent.

The amount absorbed will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Retribution

talents.info_text:
You demonstrate your dedication to the light with a measured attack striking once with your weapon for 72%, 89%, 103%, 114%, 124% damage and once with your shield for 72%, 89%, 103%, 114%, 124% damage.

If the first strike connects 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 random talent cooldowns are reduced by 1.

If the second strike connects you are cleansed of 1 debuffs.
talents.name: Crusade

description: Chant the glory of the Moon.
name: hymns

talents.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moon, empowering your dark elemental attacks so that they do 14%, 19%, 23%, 26%, 29% additional darkness damage.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of shadows, dealing 30, 40, 48, 55, 61 darkness damage to anything that attacks you.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Hymn of Shadows

talents.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moon, granting you infravision up to 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 grids, stealth detection (+8, +11, +13, +15, +17 power), and invisibility detection (+20, +27, +33, +38, +42 power).

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of shadows, dealing 14, 20, 23, 27, 30 darkness damage to anything that attacks you.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The stealth and invisibility detection, as well as the on-hit damage, will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Hymn of Detection

talents.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moon, granting you 23%, 33%, 40%, 47%, 52% stun, blindness and confusion resistance.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of shadows, dealing 30, 40, 48, 55, 61 darkness damage to anything that attacks you.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The on-hit damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Hymn of Perseverance

talents.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moon, conjuring a shroud of dancing shadows that follows you as long as this spell is active.

Each turn, a shadowy beam will hit up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 of your foes within radius 5 for 1 to 49, 66, 79, 90, 100 damage.

This powerful spell will drain 7.7, 5.3, 4.1, 3.3, 2.8 negative energy for each beam; no beam will fire if your negative energy is too low.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Hymn of Moonlight

description: Invoke the power of the light to heal and mend.
name: light

talents.info_text:
An invigorating ray of Sunlight shines upon you, healing your body for 285, 385, 463, 528, 586 life.

The amount healed will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Healing Light

talents.info_text:
A magical zone of Sunlight appears around you, healing and shielding all within a radius of 2 for 49, 66, 79, 90, 100 per turn and increasing healing effects on everyone within by 24%, 32%, 39%, 44%, 49%. The effect lasts for 4, 5, 5, 6, 7 turns.

Existing damage shields will be added to instead of overwritten and have their duration set to 2 if it isn't higher.

If the same shield is refreshed 20 times it will become unstable and explode, removing it.

It also lights up the affected zone.

The amount healed will increase with the Magic stat
talents.name: Bathe in Light

talents.info_text:
A protective shield forms around you that lasts for up to 10 turns and negates 238, 322, 386, 441, 490 damage.

The total damage the barrier can absorb will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Barrier

talents.info_text:
Places you under the protection of Light itself. For 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns, the light heals 29, 40, 48, 55, 61 life and removes a single negative effect from you.

The amount healed will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Providence

talents.info_text: Instantly travel to your jumpgate, as long as you are within 13, 14, 16, 17, 18 tiles of it.
talents.name: Jumpgate: Teleport To

talents.info_text: Create a second shadow jumpgate at your location. As long as you sustain this spell, you can use 'Jumpgate: Teleport' to instantly travel to the jumpgate, as long as you are within 13, 14, 16, 17, 18 tiles of it.
talents.name: Jumpgate Two

talents.info_text: Instantly travel to your second jumpgate, as long as you are within 13, 14, 16, 17, 18 tiles of it.
talents.name: Jumpgate Two: Teleport To

description: You channel the light of the sun through your body.
name: radiance

talents.info_text:
You are so infused with sunlight that your body glows permanently in radius 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, even in dark places.

Your vision adapts to this glow, giving you 28%, 53%, 65%, 72%, 76% blindness resistance.

The light radius overrides your normal light if it is bigger (it does not stack).
talents.name: Radiance

talents.info_text:
The light of your Radiance allows you to see that which would normally be unseen.

All enemies in your Radiance aura have their invisibility and stealth power reduced by 76, 97, 114, 128, 140.

In addition, all actors affected by illumination are easier to see and therefore hit; their defense is reduced by 25, 32, 38, 43, 47 and all evasion bonuses from being unseen are negated.

The effects increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Illumination

talents.info_text:
Your Radiance is so powerful it burns all foes caught in it, doing up to 21, 28, 33, 38, 42 light damage (reduced with distance) to all foes caught inside.

At level 4 the light is so bright it has 5%, 11%, 15%, 18%, 20% chances to daze them for 3 turns.

The damage increases with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Searing Sight

talents.info_text: Fire a glowing orb of light at each enemy within your Radiance. Each orb will slowly follow its target until it connects dealing 23, 31, 38, 43, 48 light damage to anything else it contacts along the way. When the target is reached the orb will explode dealing 93, 125, 151, 172, 191 light damage and healing you for 50% of the damage dealt. This powerful ability will dim your Radiance, reducing its radius to 1 for 5 turns.
talents.name: Judgement

description: Call the fury of the Stars and the Moon to destroy your foes.
name: star fury

talents.info_text:
Focuses the power of the Moon into a beam of shadows, doing 146, 196, 236, 269, 299 damage.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Moonlight Ray

talents.info_text:
Invokes a blast of shadows that deals 68, 91, 110, 125, 139 darkness damage, and leaves a radius 3 field that does 24, 32, 38, 44, 48 darkness damage per turn for 2, 4, 4, 5, 6 turns.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shadow Blast

talents.info_text:
A surge of twilight pulses from you, doing 33, 61, 83, 101, 117 light and 33, 61, 83, 101, 117 darkness damage to all others within radius 2.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Twilight Surge

talents.info_text:
A star falls on a radius 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 area, doing 106, 143, 172, 197, 218 darkness damage on impact and stunning all within the area for 4 turns.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Starfall

description: Summon the power of the Sun to burn your foes.
name: sun

talents.info_text:
Calls forth a beam of light from the Sun, doing 139, 188, 225, 257, 285 Light damage to the target.

At level 3 the beam will be so intense it will also blind the target and everyone in a radius 2 around it for 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Sun Ray

talents.info_text:
A path of sunlight appears in front of you for 5 turns. All foes standing inside take 40, 54, 64, 74, 82 Light damage per turn.

While standing in the path, your movement takes no time and can not trigger traps.

The damage done will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Path of the Sun

talents.info_text:
Infuse yourself with the raging fury of the Sun, increasing your physical and spell critical chance by 2%, 4%, 6%, 8%, 10%.

Each time you crit with a physical attack or a spell you have 33%, 54%, 65%, 72%, 76% chance to gain Sun's Vengeance for 2 turns.

While affected by Sun's Vengeance, your Sun Ray will take no time to use and will deal 25% more damage.

If Sun Ray was on cooldown, the remaining turns are reduced by one instead.

This effect can only happen once per turn.
talents.name: Sun's Vengeance

talents.info_text:
You wrap yourself in a cloak of sunlight that empowers your magic and protects you for 6 turns.

While the cloak is active, your spell casting speed is increased by 19%, 26%, 31%, 36%, 40%, your spell cooldowns are reduced by 32%, 36%, 38%, 39%, 40%, and you cannot take more than 89%, 82%, 76%, 72%, 68% of your maximum life from a single blow.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Suncloak

description: Summon the power of the Sun to burn your foes.
name: sunlight

talents.info_text:
Calls the power of the Sun into a searing lance, doing 100, 135, 162, 185, 205 damage to the target and leaving a spot on the ground for 4 turns that does 49, 66, 79, 90, 100 light damage to anyone within it.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Searing Light

talents.info_text:
Invokes the Sun to cause a flare within radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 4, blinding your foes for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns and lighting up your immediate area (radius 4, 6, 6, 8, 8).

At level 3 it will also do 49, 66, 79, 90, 100 light damage within radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 4.

The damage done will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Sun Flare

talents.info_text:
Call forth the Sun to summon a fiery beam, burning all targets in a line for 126, 170, 204, 233, 259 fire damage.

The damage done will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Firebeam

talents.info_text:
Conjures a furious burst of Sunlight, dealing 100, 135, 162, 185, 205 light damage to all around you in a radius of 3.

The damage done will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Sunburst

description: Stand between the darkness and the light, harnessing both.
name: twilight

talents.info_text:
You stand between the darkness and the light, allowing you to convert 15 positive energy into 80, 127, 167, 202, 233 negative energy.

Learning this talent will change the default level of positive and negative energies to 21%, 26%, 30%, 33%, 35% of their maximum. Each turn, the energies will slowly fall/rise to this value, instead of 0.

The negative energy gain will increase with your Cunning.
talents.name: Twilight

talents.info_text:
Create a shadow jumpgate at your current location. As long as you sustain this spell, you can use 'Jumpgate: Teleport' to instantly travel to the jumpgate, as long as you are within 13, 14, 16, 17, 18 tiles of it.

Note that any stairs underneath the jumpgate will be unusable while the spell is sustained, and you may need to cancel this sustain in order to leave certain locations.

At talent level 4, you learn to create and sustain a second jumpgate.
talents.name: Jumpgate

talents.info_text:
Let out a mental cry that shatters the will of your targets within radius 3, confusing (17%, 31%, 39%, 43%, 46% to act randomly) them for 9, 10, 11, 11, 12 turns.

The duration will improve with your Cunning.
talents.name: Mind Blast

talents.info_text:
Creates a shadowy copy of a hostile target of up to medium, medium, big, big, huge size. The copy will attack its progenitor immediately and lasts for 15, 16, 17, 17, 18 turns.

The duplicate has 23%, 33%, 40%, 46%, 52% of the target's life, 23%, 33%, 40%, 46%, 52% all damage resistance, +50% darkness resistance and -50% light resistance.

The duration, life and all damage resistance scale with your Cunning and this ability will not work on bosses.
talents.name: Shadow Simulacrum
